hero.title: About Askia — Career coaching built for signal
hero.subtitle: We turn high‑potential careers into clear, decisive narratives — then help you execute with confidence.
hero.proof: Built for ambitious tech professionals ready to move up.

values.title: Signal over noise
values.body: We remove the fluff and build a narrative that recruiters and hiring managers can feel immediately.

values.title: Momentum is engineered
values.body: We don’t leave outcomes to chance. Every step is designed to convert to interviews and offers.

values.title: Confidence is a system
values.body: Interview performance isn’t a vibe — it’s a repeatable framework you can trust under pressure.

story.title: Why Askia exists
story.body: Most talented people aren’t losing because they lack skill — they’re losing because they lack signal. Askia exists to change that. We help you translate your experience into a compelling narrative, build a smart search strategy, and execute interviews with calm, confident precision.

founder.name: Steve J. Ngoumnai
founder.body: Steve is a former engineering leader who built Askia to solve a simple problem: top talent shouldn’t be invisible. His approach blends real hiring‑table insight with crisp positioning and execution‑focused coaching.

team.name: Maya Lopez
team.bio: Former hiring manager turned interview strategist. Maya is known for turning scattered answers into crisp, memorable stories.

team.name: Derek Tran
team.bio: Ex‑recruiter who obsesses over signal. Derek rebuilds resumes and LinkedIn profiles so they read like a decision‑maker wrote them.

team.name: Sophia Reed
team.bio: Process architect behind the scenes. Sophia keeps every engagement fast, clear, and on track from day one.

cta.title: Ready to build your momentum?
cta.body: Let’s map the fastest path to interviews and offers that match your value.
